info_text:
Welcome to the AG WU Spezialisierungs-Finder!

WU offers you the opportunity to set an individual focus in your studies through specializations. However, the wide range of options can quickly become overwhelming. This test will help you find the ideal specialization for your WU studies. In just about 5 to 10 minutes, you'll answer a few questions and receive tailored recommendations that perfectly match your interests.

Have fun discovering your specialization!
further_info: Here you will find more information
einstiegsliste: Here you can find the application modalities for all specializations!
nachfrageliste: Here you can gain an insight into which specializations are most in demand among students!
meinungsbroschuere: Here you can find out what experiences fellow students have had with the individual specializations!
